info.name: Unifi Dark Mode
info.description: A Quick style I made to darken the Unifi control panel - Hopefully I'll keep this up to date but it depends on if people like it and when I get the time
info.additionalInfo: - Changelog - --- Version 1.0.1 --- Updated to effect new elements on website and fixed some border colors _______________________________ --- Version 1.0 --- Fixed most hover menus and formatted the Dashboard page better Fixed an issue with the properties panel close button not showing correct symbol Fixed the terrible color the side (release notes section) hover was Fixed some other issues as noted below :) - Known issues - Hovering options still bright - Fixed almost of them (down arrow on tool-tips giving me trouble) Some drop-down menus need formatted Borders and some text colors could use some attention Greys need standardized so hue is perfectly consistent (it's close tho) User's Avatar/profile pic may be affected (turns mine dark for some reason) - Seems to be a non-issue now (?) Lime Green not changed yet - Fixed with a more compatible shade of green :)
